title: Backend: SSE convoy updates subscription
description:
Add SSE endpoint for real-time convoy updates.

## Endpoint
GET /convoys/subscribe (SSE stream)

## Events
1. **convoy:updated**
   - Convoy status changed
   - Progress changed (issue completed)
   - Payload: { convoy_id, status, progress, completed, total }

2. **convoy:created**
   - New convoy created
   - Payload: full Convoy object

3. **convoy:closed**
   - Convoy landed
   - Payload: { convoy_id, closed_at }

4. **issue:status**
   - Tracked issue status changed
   - Payload: { convoy_id, issue_id, old_status, new_status }

5. **worker:assigned**
   - Worker started on tracked issue
   - Payload: { convoy_id, issue_id, worker, agent }

## Implementation
- Poll gt convoy list periodically (5s)
- Diff against cached state
- Emit events for changes
- Client reconnection handling

## Frontend Integration
- useConvoySubscription hook
- Auto-refresh convoy list on events
- Update detail panel in real-time
- Activity indicators on cards
close_reason: Implemented SSE convoy updates: ConvoyStreamer polls gt convoy list, emits events for changes, useConvoySubscription hook auto-invalidates React Query cache

title: Frontend: Create convoy modal with issue picker
description:
Build a proper create convoy modal that lets users select issues to track.

## Modal Design
- Triggered by 'New Convoy' button
- Multi-step or single form

## Fields
1. **Convoy Name** (required)
   - Text input
   - Auto-suggest from first selected issue title

2. **Issue Picker** (required, multi-select)
   - Searchable list of available issues
   - Show: ID, title, status, rig
   - Filter by: rig, status, type
   - Checkbox selection
   - Selected issues shown as chips above

3. **Notify Address** (optional)
   - Dropdown/input for notification target
   - Default options: mayor/, ops/
   - Custom address option

4. **Molecule** (optional, advanced)
   - Link to existing molecule
   - Collapsed by default

## Behavior
- Validate at least one issue selected
- Show preview of convoy before creation
- Loading state during creation
- Success: close modal, select new convoy
- Error: show inline error, keep modal open

## API
- GET /beads?status=open for issue list
- POST /convoys for creation

title: Frontend: Synthesis workflow UI
description:
Build UI for convoy synthesis workflow support.

## Synthesis Panel (in convoy detail)
Shows when convoy has formula or multiple legs.

### States

**Not Ready**
- Show list of incomplete legs
- Each leg shows: title, status, assignee
- Progress bar for overall completion
- Disabled 'Start Synthesis' button with tooltip

**Ready**
- Green 'All legs complete' indicator
- Active 'Start Synthesis' button
- Leg outputs preview (collapsible)

**In Progress**
- Show synthesis bead status
- Link to synthesis bead
- Worker info if assigned

**Complete**
- Show synthesis output (if available)
- Link to output file/content

## Start Synthesis Modal
- Target rig selector (dropdown)
- Review ID input (auto-filled from convoy)
- Dry-run option (preview only)
- Confirm button

## API Calls
- GET /synthesis/:id/status
- POST /convoys/:id/synthesis
close_reason: Implemented SynthesisPanel with ready/not-ready states, incomplete legs list, start modal with rig selector
